title: looking for group always
body:
just looking for people to play norms with or ranked im easy going not real good not real bad but have good and bad days 
i never rage i can use all voice comm's  no salt but yea add me if you want to group add and invite let's have some fun

replies.body:
Hey i just added in in game

HMU dude
i can play with you but only weekends :)
